SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwChargenQuestScript

float fQuestDelayTime
short AddGuildTopics
short JiubSpeak
short Guard01Stage
short GuardDockStage
short CensusStage
short GotPapers
float waittimer
short gotoStage
 
short ClassQuizStage
string_var quizQuestion
string_var quizChoice1
string_var quizChoice2
string_var quizChoice3
short quizAnswer
short quizScoreCombat
short quizScoreMagic
short quizScoreStealth
short getQuizAnswer
short OfferedSkipQuiz

short bAltStart_Detected

BEGIN GameMode

	if (JiubSpeak == 1)
		if (GetPCIsClass CharactergenClass == 0)
			set bAltStart_Detected to 1
		endif
	endif
	
	if (getQuizAnswer == 1)
		set quizAnswer to GetButtonPressed
		if (quizAnswer == -1)
			return
		endif
		if (quizAnswer == 0)
			set quizScoreCombat to quizScoreCombat +1
		elseif (quizAnswer == 1)
			set quizScoreMagic to quizScoreMagic +1
		elseif (quizAnswer == 2)
			set quizScoreStealth to quizScoreStealth +1
		endif
		set getQuizAnswer to 0
		set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1
	endif
	
	if (waittimer > 0)
		set waittimer to (waittimer - GetSecondsPassed)
		; look for L+R button escape signal
		if (IsKeyPressed2 256) && (IsKeyPressed2 257)
			set waittimer to 0
		endif
		return
	endif

	if (gotoStage > 0)
		SetStage fbmwChargen gotoStage
		set gotoStage to 0
	endif
	
	; Jiub (slave who asks for your name, aka 0chargenSname)
	if JiubSpeak > 0

		if JiubSpeak == 1
			DisablePlayerControls
			set waittimer to mwJiubREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkJiub
			set JiubSpeak to 2
			return
		elseif JiubSpeak == 2
			set waittimer to mwJiubREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkJiub
			set JiubSpeak to 3
			return
		elseif JiubSpeak == 3
			set waittimer to mwJiubREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkJiub
			set JiubSpeak to 4
		elseif JiubSpeak == 4
			mwJiubREF.Look mwCGGuard1REF
			set JiubSpeak to -1
		endif

	endif

	; First guard you meet (aka Julius Cerantus or 0chargenSboatSguardS2)
	if Guard01Stage == 2
		set waittimer to mwCGGuard1REF.SayTo Player mwCGGuard01Talk 1
		set Guard01Stage to 3
	elseif Guard01Stage == 3
		EnablePlayerControls
		set Guard01Stage to 4
		mwCGGuard1REF.evp
	elseif Guard01Stage == 4
		mwJiubREF.Look Player
		; Jiub should say "You better do what they say..."
	endif

	if GuardDockStage > 0

		; Guard you meet on docks (asked for your race in Morrowind)
		if GuardDockStage == 1
			set waittimer to mwCGGuardDockREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkGuardDock
			set GuardDockStage to 2
		elseif GuardDockStage == 2
			set waittimer to mwCGGuardDockREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkGuardDock
			set GuardDockStage to 3
		elseif GuardDockStage == 3
			EnablePlayerControls
			set GuardDockStage to 4
			mwCGGuardDockREF.evp
		endif

	endif

	if CensusStage > 0

		; Socucius Ergalla (say hello and ask to record data)
		if CensusStage == 1
;			set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkSocuciusErgalla
			; Ask about the Class Quiz
			if (ClassQuizStage == 0)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 1)
				; Skip ahead here if chargen already done in oblivion
				if (bAltStart_Detected == 1)
					set ClassQuizStage to 100
					return
				endif
				if (OfferedSkipQuiz == 0)
					; get ready to ask to skip the quiz
					set OfferedSkipQuiz to 1
					MessageBoxEx "Do you want to take the class quiz?|Take Quiz|Skip Quiz"
					return
				elseif (OfferedSkipQuiz == 1)
					; get answer
					set quizAnswer to GetButtonPressed
					if (quizAnswer == -1)
						return
					endif
					if (quizAnswer == 1)
						set ClassQuizStage to 100
					elseif (quizAnswer == 0)
						set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1
					endif
				endif
			; Do Class Quiz, then open classmenu
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 2)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 3)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "On a clear day you chance upon a strange animal, its leg trapped in a hunter's clawsnare.  Judging from the bleeding it will not survive long."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Draw your dagger, mercifully ending its life with a single thrust."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Use herbs from your pack to put it to sleep."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Do not interfere in the natural evolution of events, but rather take the opportunity to learn more about a strange animal you have never seen before."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1
				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 4)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 5)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "One Summer afternoon your father gives you a choice of chores."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Work in the forge with him casting iron for a new plow."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Gather herbs for your mother who is preparing dinner."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Go catch fish at the stream using a net and line."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1		
				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 6)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 7)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "Your cousin has given you a very embarrassing nickname and, even worse, likes to call you it in front of your friends.  You've asked him to stop, but he finds it very amusing to watch you blush."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Beat up your cousin, then tell him that if he ever calls you that nickname again, you will bloody him worse than this time."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Make up a story that makes your nickname a badge of honor instead of something humiliating."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Make up an even more embarrassing nickname for him and use it constantly until he learns his lesson."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 8)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 9)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "There is a lot of heated discussion at the local tavern over a group of people called 'Telepaths'.  They have been hired by certain City-State Kings.  Rumor has it these Telepaths read a person's mind and tell their lord whether a follower is telling the truth or not."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "This is a terrible practice.  A person's thoughts are his own and no one, not even a king, has the right to make such an invasion into another human's mind."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Loyal followers to the king have nothing to fear from a Telepath.  It is important to have a method of finding assassins and spies before it is too late."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "In these times, it is a necessary evil.  Although you do not necessarily like the idea, a Telepath could have certain advantages during a time of war or in finding someone innocent of a crime."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 10)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 11)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "Your mother sends you to the market with a list of goods to buy.  After you finish you find that by mistake a shopkeeper has given you too much money back in exchange for one of the items."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Return to the store and give the shopkeeper his hard-earned money, explaining to him the mistake."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Decide to put the extra money to good use and purchase items that would help your family."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Pocket the extra money, knowing that shopkeepers in general tend to overcharge customers anyway."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 12)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 13)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "While in the market place you witness a thief cut a purse from a noble.  Even as he does so, the noble notices and calls for the city guards.  In his haste to get away, the thief drops the purse near you.  Surprisingly no one seems to notice the bag of coins at your feet."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Pick up the bag and signal to the guard, knowing that the only honorable thing to do is return the money to its rightful owner."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Leave the bag there, knowing that it is better not to get involved."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Pick up the bag and pocket it, knowing that the extra windfall will help your family in times of trouble."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				
				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 14)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 15)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "Your father sends you on a task which you loathe, cleaning the stables.  On the way there, pitchfork in hand, you run into your friend from the homestead near your own.  He offers to do it for you, in return for a future favor of his choosing."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Decline his offer, knowing that your father expects you to do the work, and it is better not to be in debt."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Ask him to help you, knowing that two people can do the job faster than one, and agree to help him with one task of his choosing in the future."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Accept his offer, reasoning that as long as the stables are cleaned, it matters not who does the cleaning."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 16)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 17)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "Your mother asks you to help fix the stove.  While you are working, a very hot pipe slips its moorings and falls towards her."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Position yourself between the pipe and your mother."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Grab the hot pipe and try to push it away."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Push your mother out of the way."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 18)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 19)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "While in town the baker gives you a sweetroll.  Delighted, you take it into an alley to enjoy only to be intercepted by a gang of three other kids your age.  The leader demands the sweetroll, or else he and his friends will beat you and take it."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Drop the sweetroll and step on it, then get ready for the fight."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Give him the sweetroll now without argument, knowing that later this afternoon you will have all your friends with you and can come and take whatever he owes you."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Act like you're going to give him the sweetroll, but at the last minute throw it in the air, hoping that they'll pay attention to it long enough for you to get a shot in on the leader."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 20)
				set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkClassQuiz
				set ClassQuizStage to ClassQuizStage + 1				
			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 21)
				set quizQuestion to sv_Construct "Entering town you find that you are witness to a very well-dressed man running from a crowd.  He screams to you for help.  The crowd behind him seems very angry."
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Construct "Rush to the town's aid immediately, despite your lack of knowledge of the circumstances."
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Construct "Stand aside and allow the man and the mob to pass, realizing it is probably best not to get involved."
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Construct "Rush to the man's aid immediately, despite your lack of knowledge of the circumstances."
				MessageBoxEX "%z%r|%z|%z|%z", quizQuestion, quizChoice1, quizChoice2, quizChoice3
				set quizQuestion to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice1 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice2 to sv_Destruct
				set quizChoice3 to sv_Destruct
				set getQuizAnswer to 1				

			elseif (ClassQuizStage == 22)				
				; determine class selection based on scores, then move on to next stage
				; Core classes
				printc "Debug: Quiz Scores: Combat=%.0f Magic=%.0f Stealth=%.0f", quizScoreCombat, quizScoreMagic, quizScoreStealth
				if (quizScoreCombat >= 7)
					player.SetClass warrior
				elseif (quizScoreMagic >= 7)
					player.SetClass mage
				elseif (quizScoreStealth >= 7)
					player.SetClass thief
				; Combat classes
				elseif (quizScoreCombat == 6) 
					if (quizScoreMagic == 4) || (quizScoreMagic == 2) || (quizScoreMagic == 0)
						player.SetClass knight
					elseif (quizScoreMagic == 3) 
						player.SetClass barbarian
					elseif (quizScoreMagic == 1) 
						player.SetClass crusader
					endif
				elseif (quizScoreCombat == 5)
					if (quizScoreMagic == 2)
						player.SetClass scout
					else
						player.SetClass archer
					endif
				; Magic classes
				elseif (quizScoreMagic == 6)
					if (quizScoreCombat == 4) || (quizScoreCombat == 3)
						player.SetClass healer
					elseif (quizScoreCombat == 2)
						player.SetClass sorcerer
					elseif (quizScoreCombat == 1) || (quizScoreCombat == 0) 
						player.SetClass battlemage
					endif
				elseif (quizScoreMagic == 5) ; combat=5 already set to archer above
					player.SetClass witchhunter
				elseif (quizScoreMagic == 4) ; combat=5 or 6 already set above
					player.SetClass spellsword
				; Stealth classes
				elseif (quizScoreStealth == 6) ; combat=4 set above
					if (quizScoreMagic == 3)
						player.SetClass assassin
					elseif (quizScoreMagic == 2)
						player.SetClass acrobat
					elseif (quizScoreMagic == 1)
						player.SetClass agent
					else
						player.SetClass rogue
					endif
				elseif (quizScoreStealth == 5) ; magic=5,4 set above
					if (quizScoreMagic == 3)
						player.SetClass monk
					elseif (quizScoreMagic == 2)
						player.SetClass pilgrim
					else
						player.SetClass rogue	
					endif
				else
					player.SetClass bard
				endif
				MessageBox "Here are the results of your class quiz..."
				set ClassQuizStage to 100

			elseif ClassQuizStage == 100
				set CensusStage to CensusStage + 1
			endif

		elseif CensusStage == 2
			; Open the Class Menu
			SetStage fbmwChargen 10
			set CensusStage to CensusStage + 1
		elseif CensusStage == 3
			; Ask about Birth Sign
			set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkSocuciusErgalla
			set CensusStage to CensusStage + 1
		elseif CensusStage == 4
			; open birthsign menu
			SetStage fbmwChargen 20
			set CensusStage to CensusStage + 1
		elseif CensusStage == 5
			set waittimer to mwSocuciusErgallaREF.SayTo Player mwCGTalkSocuciusErgalla
			set CensusStage to CensusStage + 1
		elseif CensusStage == 6
			EnablePlayerControls
;			mwSocuciusErgallaREF.evp
			mwSocuciusErgallaREF.PickIdle
			mwCGPapersREF.enable
			set CensusStage to -1
		endif

	endif

	
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 14345 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
